schema:creator: Greene, Henry Dart
schema:description: This film, taken in 1935, begins with footage of auction markets, likely on the East Coast. Boxes of Florida oranges and grapefruits can be seen along with other produce. At 1:11 the footage shifts to Greeneâ€™s visit to Cuba. Included in this portion are moving images of Havana, its buildings, streets, and people, along with views of the countryside and possibly a store with a number of people in front of it. (Video only)
schema:name: Fruit and produce auctions & visit to Cuba, 1935
